alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 29 at 10:45PM CDT until March 29 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND AND WEST CENTRAL POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 1045 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Slaughterville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Slaughterville, Tribbey, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb and Trousdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
